name: New York City Plumber
description:
You like manual work and you’re not afraid to dirty your hands while on the job? Then come change lead into gold and earn a lot of cash through ludicrously high bills in this new plumber game. The piping of New York is on the verge of destruction and everybody is soon going to call for a good plumber. Don’t bum around and go equipped with your toolbox to take part to this gigantic work site.

New York City Plumber is a puzzle/reflexion game in which you must keep the water level well under its critical level. To accomplish this task, you must form way through which water must be evacuated. You can rotate every piece of pipe simply by tapping on it.

Put your neurons to the trial through a hundred of level of increasing complexity. Create as many ways as you can to evacuated the water of New York and become the ultimate champion of plumbers in the eyes of everybody.

CARACTERISTICS
- 100 puzzles of increasing difficulty
- 300 stars to collect
- Great graphisms
- Best score
